gifting_collection_heading_description: Exquisitely packaged to benefit every occasion, we celebrate your pride, happiness and relationships with absolute grandeur.
return_policy: We do not accept returns. Refunds are provided in certain cases. Please email us at care@logosweets.net  with relevant information and images for assistance.
reach_out_for_inquiry: You can reach out to us for product related information, bulk inquiries or special requests at
would_you_like_to_write: Would you like to write anything about this product?
tax_included: Tax included. Shipping calculated at checkout.
user_login_new_customer_description: Sign up for early Sale access plus tailored new arrivals, trends and promotions. To opt out, click unsubscribe in our emails.
user_register_description: Sign up for early Sale access plus tailored new arrivals, trends and promotions. To opt out, click unsubscribe in our emails.

please_check_payment_details_desc: Please check your payment details or try another payment method.

introduction_description_desc1: Logo Sweets & Savouries LLP and/or its affiliates ('Logo Sweets') provide website features and other products and services to you when you visit or shop at www.logosweets.in, to use our products or services. Logo Sweets provides the services subject to the following terms and conditions.
introduction_description_desc2: By using Products or Services through www.logosweets.in, you willfully out of free will unconditionally agree to these below conditions.
electronic_communication_description: When you use any of Logo Sweets' services, or send emails to us, you are communicating with us electronically. You consent to receive communications from us electronically. We will communicate with you by e-mail/text message. You agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing.
copyright_description: All content included in or made available through any of the availed service, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips and data compilations is the property of Logo Sweets or its content suppliers and shall be protected and governed by laws of India. All unwarranted copies of content are strictly prohibited and illegal.
trademarks_description: In addition, graphics, logos, page headers, button icons, scripts, and service names included in or made available through any service are trademarks or service mark of Logo Sweets or its affiliates or its content suppliers but you by availing of the services does not get any right for copying or using the same.
your_login_account_description: If you register yourself with the portal, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for the authenticity of the information and for all activities that occur under your account or password. However, Logo Sweets reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, remove or edit content, or cancel orders in its sole discretion with no damage or demure payable to you.
risk_of_loss_description: All items purchased through electronic mode through this website are made pursuant to a shipment contract. This means that the risk of loss and title for such items pass to you upon our delivery to the carrier (shipping partner) for dispatch.
acceptance_of_your_order_subheading: You can place an order through our website www.logosweets.in. Non-acceptance of an order may be a result of one of the following
acceptance_of_your_order_desc1: 1. The product you ordered being out of stock- see product availability
acceptance_of_your_order_desc2: 2. Our inability to obtain authorisation for your payment
acceptance_of_your_order_desc3: 3. The identification of a pricing or product description error
acceptance_of_your_order_desc4: 4. Failure to meet the eligibility to order criteria set out in the Terms and Conditions
acceptance_of_your_order_desc5: 5. We reserve the right to reject acceptance of any order at any time in our absolute discretion
online_desc1: 1. Shortly after you have placed an order with us, an email/sms will be sent to you acknowledging the exact details of your order.
online_desc2: 2. Acceptance of an order placed by you online and the completion of the contract between you and logosweets.in will take place when your order is dispatched, unless you have cancelled the order in accordance with the order cancellation instructions set out below.
online_desc3: 3. Our customer service team is available between 10AM to 6PM on all working days - Monday to Friday on 080-41238726
online_desc4: 4. When an order is placed, we request preauthorization for the value of the order from your bank/card issuer to ensure that the funds are available. However, this remains simply a pre-authorization request until the order is shipped, at which point we actually take payment. We have found that some card companies show the initial request and the later charge as two separate entries. Please be assured that we only charge your card once and that any 'second' charge is only temporary and will shortly disappear. If you have any further queries, please contact your bank/card issuer.
online_desc5: 5. By registering yourself with us, you hereby agree that your consent has been given to us to send out SMS on our product updates / festive offers / marketing campaigns via SMS & WhatsApp.
order_cancellation_desc1: 1. If you wish to cancel your order placed, you can do so online by logging into your account and cancelling any order you wish.
order_cancellation_desc2: 2. If your order has already been dispatched, we will not be in a position to do cancellations. Further details are set out in our Returns Policy section.
order_cancellation_desc3: 3. In order to change the details of your order, you must change the order details online within 15 minutes of your order being placed. After this time, we will be unable to amend your order as we endeavor to process orders immediately.
returns_refunds_and_title_desc1: 1. Logo Sweets does not take title to returned items. Any case of refund or cancellation is at sole discretion of Logo Sweet
returns_refunds_and_title_desc2: 2. In case of refund, store credit or coupon code will be provided of the refund amount.
returns_refunds_and_title_desc3: Once the order process for dispatch, cancellation will not be allowed.
returns_refunds_and_title_desc4: IMPORTANT: Please note that during periods of significantly increased demand and lower stock availability, such as festivals such as Rakhi, Diwali, etc., there is an increased risk of items being out of stock
product_availablity_information_desc1: 1. We feature products/services on our website that have been carefully selected for an exclusive buying experience. Once a product is sold out, it will be temporarily unavailable on the website and will only be available again once back in stock.
product_availablity_information_desc2: 2. Prices of products/services may change from time to time. If items you order are out of stock, subject to a delay, or sold at a higher/lower price than shown on your order, we will contact you at the email address or telephone number you provided when placing your order. If we are unable to contact you via telephone or email, we will cancel the part of your order that is unavailable or incorrectly priced and will continue to process the remaining items on your order (where applicable).
product_availablity_information_desc3: 3. All products are subject to availability. If, due to unforeseen circumstances, it is necessary to substitute an item, the item will be of equal or greater value than the item it is replacing - substitutions will only be made with your prior consent. If a replacement item is of greater value, you will be liable to pay for the difference in product values.
product_availablity_information_desc4: IMPORTANT: Please note that during periods of significantly increased demand and lower stock availability, such as festivals such as Rakhi, Diwali etc., there is an increased risk of items being out of stock.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc1: 1. We only accept payment for orders in INR.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc2: 2. We accept payment by Credit/Debit Cards like MasterCard, Visa and, AMEX, Netbanking Logo Gift Cards, UPI Payments, all Mobile Wallets.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc3: 3. If you choose to pay for an item using a payment card with a foreign currency denominated account, the account will still be taken in INR at the conversion rate applied by the relevant payment scheme at the time of processing your order.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc4: 4. Please note, we cannot guarantee the security of data, which you send us by email. Accordingly, please do not send us payment information using email. For details of the security measures we employ, please read our Security and Privacy policy.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc5: 5. Unless the information provided by you was used fraudulently or negligently by us, we will not be liable to you for any losses caused as a result of unauthorized access to the personal and transactional information you provide us when placing an order.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc6: 6. Please note that Logo Sweets does not accept cash or cheques as payment online
payment_and_refund_policy_desc7: 7. In case of a payment failure, please retry ensuring: Information passed on to the payment gateway is accurate i.e. account details, billing address, password (for net banking), etc. Kindly also check if your Internet connection has been disrupted in the process.
payment_and_refund_policy_desc8: 8. If your account has been debited after a payment failure, it is normally rolled back to your account within 7 business days. You can email us on
payment_and_refund_policy_desc9: with your order number for any clarification.
pricing_policy_desc1: 1. All prices shown on the website are in INR. Taxes are all inclusive and shall be highlighted after checkout, before the final payment. Prices may change and offers may be withdrawn at any time without prior notice.
pricing_policy_desc2: 2. Although we try to ensure all our prices displayed on our website are accurate, errors may sometimes occur. If we discover an error in the price of a product item you have ordered, we will contact you as soon as possible. You will have the option to reconfirm your order at the correct price or cancel it. If we are unable to contact you, we may treat your order, in respect of the incorrectly priced item, as cancelled.
pricing_policy_desc3: 3. Logo Sweets endeavors to ensure that all products offered on the website are available at the same price as it is offered on the various other market places, in case if the same items are listed by Logo Sweets, however if the partner brand itself lists the product at different price Logo Sweets cannot be held responsible.
shipping_policy_introduction: Logo Sweets & Savouries ('we' and 'us') is the operator of (https://www.logosweets.in) ('Website'). By placing an order through this Website you will be agreeing to the terms below. These are provided to ensure both parties are aware of and agree upon this arrangement to mutually protect and set expectations on our service.
general_description: Subject to stock availability. We try to maintain accurate stock counts on our website but from time-to-time there may be a stock discrepancy and we will not be able to fulfill all your items at time of purchase. In this instance, we will fulfill the available products to you, and contact you about whether you would prefer to await restocking of the backordered item or if you would prefer for us to process a refund.
domestic_shipping_description: Shipping costs are calculated during checkout based on weight, dimensions and destination of the items in the order. Payment for shipping will be collected with the purchase. This price will be the final price for shipping cost to the customer.
2.2_international_shipping_description: Shipping costs are calculated during the checkout based on weight, dimensions and destination of the items in the order. Payment for shipping will be collected with the purchase. This price will be the final price for shipping cost to the customer. Once the order is dispatched, there will be no cancellation of the order allowed. Additionally, the customer is liable to pay the custom duty charges levied by the government during the delivery of the order. In case, the customer does not pay the custom duty charges, Logo Sweets & Savouries is not liable to refund the order amount to the customer.
3.1_transit_time_domestically_descriptio: In general, domestic shipments are in transit for 2 - 7 days, and for international shipments are in transit for 5-10 days.
3.2_dispatch_time_description: Orders are usually dispatched within 2 business days of payment of order Our warehouse operates on Monday - Saturday during standard business hours, except on national holidays at which time the warehouse will be closed. In these instances, we take steps to ensure shipment delays will be kept to a minimum.
3.3_chnage_of_delivery_address_desc: For change of delivery address requests, we are able to change the address at any time before the order has been dispatched.
3.4_items_out_of_stock_desc: If an item is out of stock, we will cancel and refund the out-of-stock items and dispatch the rest of the order.
3.5_items_out_of_stock_desc: If delivery time has exceeded the forecasted time, please contact us so that we can conduct an investigation
4_tracking_notification_desc: Upon dispatch, customers will receive a tracking link from which they will be able to follow the progress of their shipment based on the latest updates made available by the shipping provider.
5_pracels_damaged_transit_desc: If you find a parcel is damaged in-transit, if possible, please reject the parcel from the courier and get in touch with our customer service. If the parcel has been delivered without you being present, please contact customer service with next steps.
6_duties_and_taxes_desc: Sales tax has already been applied to the price of the goods as displayed on the website
7_cancellation_desc: If you change your mind before you have received your order, we are able to accept cancellations at any time before the order has been dispatched. If an order has already been dispatched, the order will not be canceled.
8_customer_service_desc: For all customer service enquiries, please email us at
return_policy_desc1: If, for any reason, You are not completely satisfied with a purchase, we invite You to review our Policy.
return_policy_desc2: The following terms are applicable for any products that you purchased with us.
interpretation_desc: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
definition_desc1: For the purposes of this Return and Exchange Policy:
definition_desc2: Business Company (referred to as either 'the Company', 'We', 'Us or 'Our' in this Agreement) refers to Logo Sweets & Savouries Located at Anjanadri Heights, 34/2, 2nd Floor, Dickenson Road, 560042 Bengaluru Karnataka, IN.
definition_desc3: Goods refer to the items offered for sale on the Service.
definition_desc4: Orders mean a request by You to purchase Goods from Us.
definition_desc6: Website refers to My Site, accessible from
definition_desc7: You mean the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.
general_return_policy_desc: Product that are bought from the Physical Stores can't be returned. All Items are eligible for return and would be processed if conditions are met.
refund_policy_desc: In order to be eligible for a refund, you have to return the product within 7 days of your purchase. If the product is damaged in any way, or you have initiated the return after 7 days have passed, you will not be eligible for a refund.
refund_policy_desc1: In order for the product to be eligible for a Refund, make sure these conditions are met:
refund_policy_desc3: 2. Product must have the receipt or proof of purchase
refund_policy_desc4: If the product you have received turns out to be damaged or otherwise of poor quality, please notify us as soon as reasonably possible after you become aware of the damaged or poor quality.
refund_policy_desc5: After we receive your product information (Images for verification), our team of professionals will inspect it and process your refund. The money will be refunded to the Original Payment Method you've used during the purchase.
how_to_initiate_a_return_desc: If you have a request for Return, Refund or Exchange and if you have further clarification and questions, Please do not hesitate to contact us through our:
you_will_be_updated_for_return_desc: You will be updated for their Return Status through their EMAIL, PHONE, and SMS provided that all contact information is recorded to us.
return_policy_introduction_desc2: If, for any reason, You are not completely satisfied with a purchase, we invite You to review our Policy.
return_policy_introduction_desc3: The following terms are applicable for any products that you purchased with us.
privacy_policy_desc1: At Logo Sweets Savouries, accessible from https://logosweets.in/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Logo Sweets Savouries and how we use it.
privacy_policy_desc2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
privacy_policy_desc3: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Logo Sweets Savouries. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Free Privacy Policy Generator.
consent_desc: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
information_we_collect_desc1: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
information_we_collect_desc2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
information_we_collect_desc3: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
how_we_use_your_information_desc1: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
how_we_use_your_information_desc2: 1. Provide, operate, and maintain our website
how_we_use_your_information_desc3: 2. Improve, personalize, and expand our website
how_we_use_your_information_desc4: 3. Understand and analyze how you use our website
how_we_use_your_information_desc5: 4. Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
how_we_use_your_information_desc6: 5. Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
log_files_desc: Logo Sweets Savouries follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
cookies_web_beacons_desc1: Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. For easier access, we hyperlinked to their Privacy Policies below.
advertising_partners_privacy_policies_de: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Logo Sweets Savouries.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Logo Sweets Savouries, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.
Note that Logo Sweets Savouries has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.
third_party_privacy_policies_desc1: Logo Sweets Savouries's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.
third_party_privacy_policies_desc2: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.
CCPA_privacy_rights: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
CCPA_privacy_rights_desc1: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
CCPA_privacy_rights_desc2: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
CCPA_privacy_rights_desc3: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
CCPA_privacy_rights_desc4: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
CCPA_privacy_rights_desc5: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc1: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc2: The right to access - You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc3: The right to rectification - You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc4: The right to erasure - You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc5: The right to restrict processing - You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc6: The right to object to processing - You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc7: The right to data portability - You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
GDPR_data_protection_rights_desc8: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
children_information_desc1: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
children_information_desc2: Logo Sweets Savouries does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
we_love_to_hear_from_you: We'd love to hear from you
we_love_to_hear_from_you_desc: Whether it's a feedback, suggestion, order, complaint, or just want to say 'Hi'. Fill the below form and we shall revert to you at the earliest.
save_my_details: Save my name, email, and website in this browser for the next time comment.
contact_details_shared_successfully: We've shared your contact details with the shop. We'll get back to you shortly.
